resources.string: Threes! \n Number 3 is the only rule. \n Seems simple? We\'ll see!
Clock is ticking! You have limited time for reaction, otherwise you loose!
Every 3 seconds a number is presented to you. If number contains \'3\' digit or is divisible by it, simply tap the screen
If number doesn\'t meet the conditions, it will disappear after time is up. You can speed it up by swiping right
When the game is running for a while, \n the values of numbers are increasing.

Looks difficult? Only at first glance. There is a rule in math, that says: if sum of every digit in a number is divisible by 3, then whole number is divisible.\n 174: 1 + 7 + 4 = 12, 12 รท 3 = 4\nSee? Simple!
